gallery.title: Annual Sports Day
gallery.description: Students participating in various sports activities during the annual sports day celebration
gallery.longDescription: The Annual Sports Day at Nawa Prativa Secondary School was a grand celebration of athleticism and team spirit. Students from all grades participated in various track and field events, team sports, and cultural performances. The event featured exciting competitions in athletics, football, basketball, and traditional Nepali games. Parents and teachers actively participated in supporting and cheering for the students.

gallery.title: Science Exhibition
gallery.description: Students showcasing their innovative science projects at the annual science exhibition
gallery.longDescription: The Annual Science Exhibition showcased the innovative and creative projects developed by our students. The event featured projects ranging from renewable energy solutions to robotics and environmental conservation. Students demonstrated their understanding of scientific principles through practical applications and interactive displays. The exhibition was judged by a panel of experts from local universities and research institutions.

gallery.title: Cultural Program
gallery.description: Students performing traditional dances during the cultural program
gallery.longDescription: The Cultural Program celebrated the rich diversity of Nepali culture through music, dance, and drama performances. Students showcased various traditional dance forms, musical performances, and theatrical presentations. The event included performances of classical Nepali dances, folk music, and contemporary cultural fusion pieces. The program was attended by parents, community members, and cultural experts.
gallery.participants: Cultural Club Members and Interested Students

gallery.title: Art Exhibition
gallery.description: Students' artwork displayed during the annual art exhibition
gallery.longDescription: The Annual Art Exhibition displayed the creative talents of our students through various forms of visual art. The exhibition featured paintings, sculptures, digital art, and mixed media installations. Students from all grades participated, showcasing their artistic skills and creative expression. The event included live art demonstrations and interactive workshops conducted by professional artists.
gallery.location: School Art Gallery and Multipurpose Hall
gallery.participants: Art Students and Art Club Members

gallery.title: Sports Meet
gallery.description: Annual sports meet showcasing athletic talents of our students
gallery.longDescription: The Annual Sports Meet was a competitive event featuring various athletic disciplines. Students competed in track events, field events, and team sports. The meet included both individual and team competitions, with students representing their respective houses. The event was marked by excellent sportsmanship and record-breaking performances.

gallery.title: Class Picnic 2024
gallery.description: Students enjoying their annual class picnic
gallery.longDescription: The Annual Class Picnic was a day of fun and bonding for students and teachers. The event included various outdoor activities, team games, and cultural performances. Students enjoyed nature walks, group activities, and a special lunch prepared by the school. The picnic provided an opportunity for students to relax and build stronger relationships with their peers and teachers.

gallery.title: Environment Day
gallery.description: Students participating in environment day activities
gallery.longDescription: Environment Day was celebrated with various activities focused on environmental conservation and awareness. Students participated in tree plantation, clean-up drives, and awareness campaigns. The event included workshops on sustainable practices and environmental protection. Students created art installations using recycled materials and presented projects on environmental issues.
gallery.participants: Eco Club Members and All Students

gallery.title: Math Olympiad
gallery.description: Students competing in the annual math olympiad
gallery.longDescription: The Annual Math Olympiad challenged students' mathematical skills and problem-solving abilities. The competition included various rounds testing different aspects of mathematics, from basic arithmetic to advanced problem-solving. Students participated in both individual and team events, showcasing their mathematical prowess and logical thinking skills.

gallery.title: Graduation Day
gallery.description: Celebrating the achievements of our graduating students
gallery.longDescription: Graduation Day marked the successful completion of secondary education for our graduating students. The ceremony included the presentation of certificates, awards for academic excellence, and special recognition for outstanding achievements. Graduating students shared their experiences and future aspirations. The event was attended by parents, teachers, and distinguished guests from the education sector.
